I hear that "acquisitions" are your specialty, . Well, that and mayhem.

No need for mayhem around here, but there is something you can acquire for me: fur for the tanneries in Allemantheia.

Everyone hunts down rodents and other small animals, but I say we make one big move. Let's kill some plainstalker bears!

Great fur, friend. Sew these furs into high-quality apparel, take them to Allemantheia, and wait for customers to bring wheelbarrows full of money.

And if you're willing to stick around a while, we can make even more money, you and I.
My coin purse is open for anyone who brings some {@LinkCreature:30#200#plainstalker bear}â€™s fur. You know what a bear looks like, right?
